overview:
James Lamberti is a 20-year analytical marketing veteran and entrepreneur.

A seasoned analytical marketing executive with deep expertise in data science, consultative selling, media relations, and broad market research knowledge. I am best suited to a small to mid-size company with a consumer value proposition at the core. I have 20 years of marketing, market research, online marketing and data analytics, and consultative selling experience with Topspin, comScore, Tickets.com, Clorox, Tickets.com, and IRI. My media relations and executive rolodex in this area is also a huge asset to young companies with a media angle. An entrepreneur at heart, I also incubated a research company called QuantiView which is currently ramping up.

relationships.title: VP of Global Research and Marketing

milestones.description: Co-founded observational research company QuantiView.  Today I am board chairman and advisor.
Joined InMobi as VP, Global Research & Marketing.
milestones.source_description: InMobi Launches Publisher Analytics Tools, Hires Lamberti To Run Global Research & Marketing

milestones.description: Joined Topspin as VP, Sales and Marketing.
